welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Marlboro, where small-town charm meets vibrant city life. Known for its rich history and scenic beauty, we invite you to explore and experience all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Monmouth Executive Airport offers modern amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Monmouth Executive Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic flights for major airlines such as United, American, and Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves international flights for major airlines such as British Airways, Lufthansa, and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A is the smaller terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
